searchableProductInfo.details: Black leather, patent-leather trims (Calf)Detachable chain shoulder strap with satin ruffles, black crystals and straw fringeInternal patch pocketFully lined in signature red twillMagnetic snap-fastening flap frontComes with a dust bag
searchableProductInfo.title: Artemis ruffled leather shoulder bag
searchableProductInfo.editorsNotes: Showcasing his flair for the fashionably dramatic, Christian Louboutin gives this polished black leather bag statement status with an array of satin ruffles, crystals and fringe. Wear your hair in a sleek topknot, forgoing earrings and necklaces to let the high-impact shoulder strap be the standout accessory.Shown here with: Stella McCartney dress, Eddie Borgo bracelet and bracelet, Bottega Veneta bracelet and ring, Tom Binns ring, Alexander McQueen shoes.
searchableProductInfo.sizeAndFit:
• Weighs approximately 1.2lbs/ 0.5kg

  • Height 4" / 10.5cm

  • Min. Strap Length 9" / 24cm
